title: I accidentally transferd my account to another region and i didnt mean to do that, please help.
body:
Hello dear Riot,
I saw that event you had lately that you can transfer your account with 1 RP and i was curious " what is that hm " and while i was reading the requirements i accidentally clicked in continue ' My mouse is a potato ' and i found my account was being transferring to the turkey region i was in a shock, i didn't mean to do that i panicked {{champion:32}} , there is no single English word on the turkey region i dont understand anything there, please guys can you help me to get me back to my original server EUW please? 

My account name is "HI IM ICHYIA"

{{item:2050}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body: Oops!  We might be able to help out with this, just hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll look at your specific case and see if we can work something out.  See you there!
